channel.title: Open Source Logo
channel.description:
Is it worth adding the Open Source logo?
https://opensource.org/files/osi_standard_logo_0.png
https://opensource.org/files/osi_standard_logo_0.png
The guidelines are lengthy.
https://opensource.org/logo-usage-guidelines
//cc @HulaHoop
Related to https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/website / [whonix.org main Homepage Improvements - Looking for HTML Volunteer!](https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-org-main-homepage-improvements-looking-for-html-volunteer/8523) which is being worked on.

item.title: Open Source Logo
item.dc:creator: anontor
item.description:
It reminds me a lot of the official OpenVPN logo
https://community.openvpn.net/openvpn/wiki/OpenvpnLogosAndIcons

Read full topic

item.title: Open Source Logo
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Patrick:

Is it worth adding the Open Source logo?

Yeah why not also the Open Invention Network one if possible.

Patrick:

The guidelines are lengthy.

That’s not too bad. It comes down to not messing with the logo and putting it on a suitable color background. I was expecting to read a lengthy requirement for extra text and stuff we need to apply to the code to have it, but that’s not the case. Sensible guideline IMO.

Read full topic
